data.title: Performing and Media Arts
data.meta_description: Stephen Low Performing and Media Arts
data.text:
Major Field

Theatre Arts

Research and Scholarship Focus

Stephen Low received a Masters in Theater Studies from Cornell University, a Masters from the University of Texas at Austin in the Performance as Public Practice Program, and a Bachelor of Arts from the University of Toronto majoring in English Drama and Sexual Diversity Studies. He has published reviews in Theater Journal and Canadian Theatre Review, and is slated to published articles in Modern Drama and Theater Research In Canada this year. His scholarly interests include musical theater, queer theory, sex and sexuality, gender, critical race studies, and gay culture. His doctoral research argues that an aesthetic of theatricality is the constitutive feature of gay culture in the twenty-first century.
